title: Exploring Spanish Climate Zones: Proverb-Based Research Project

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Building a collaborative learning environment for data analysis using digital tools.

learning_goals: Students can explain the distribution and characteristics of Spain’s nine climate zones by connecting them with geographical data
Students can establish a research hypothesis inferring the characteristics of climate zones by analyzing Spanish traditional proverbs
Students can create reports visualizing climate data and presenting scientific evidence based on proverb analysis results
Students can collaboratively build and present a proverb database categorized by climate zones within teams
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
